txt.en: 'Meow! I just realized, you are talking to me. I'm a cat! How is that possible? That's just strange... Oh well, would you like to be flagged as having completed Book VII of the Epic quest series? If so, speak to me again!
'Do I even need to tell you how this works? Oh well, just in case you weren't paying attention. Completion of this quest will flag you has having completed Book VII of the Epic quest.'
Level Up: Volume II: Book VII
Completion of this quest will flag your character has having completed all the quests in Book VII of the Epic quest series of Volume II.
